greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The n-th number m such that a nontrivial prime(n)-th root of unity modulo m exists.
comment: For n > 1 the n-th number m such that phi(m) is divisible by the n-th prime.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..740
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 10 2018
